thread.title: Yemeni wedding rocked by bombing, 13 killed
thread.title_full: Yemeni wedding rocked by bombing, 13 killed | News24

author: news24.com
title: Yemeni wedding rocked by bombing, 13 killed
text:
Sanaa - At least 13 people were killed and 38 others wounded in the bombing of a wedding in a rebel-held Yemeni town, a medical source said on Thursday, as witnesses accused the Saudi-led coalition of being behind the attack.
The bombing targeted a house hosting a wedding celebration in Sanban, in Dhamar province, some 100km south of Sanaa, medics and witnesses said.
"The hospital of Dhamar has received 13 bodies and 38 wounded people following the bombing of a house where dozens were celebrating a wedding," the medical source told AFP, on condition of anonymity.
The medic did not specify the source of the bombing, but witnesses said it was an air strike by a pro-government coalition that has been targeting rebel targets since March.
